clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period required for contract termination.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs and indirect damages.
Renewal auto-renews unless cancelled 60 days before expiry.

evidence.snippet: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees, excluding data breach costs.
Contract auto-renews for 12 months unless cancelled 60 days prior to expiry.
Service availability guaranteed at 99.9% with SLA credits for downtime.

insights.message: Network security requirements may conflict with current infrastructure.
Renewal negotiation window closing in 30 days.
Data retention policy exceeds regulatory requirements.

evidence.snippet: Network must maintain 99.95% availability excluding scheduled maintenance.
All data must be retained for minimum 7 years per compliance requirements.

clauses.title: Data Location
clauses.summary: Data must remain in US-East region.

insights.message: Contract expired 4 months ago - needs renewal or migration.

evidence.snippet: Monthly usage charges shall not exceed $50,000 without prior approval.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.summary: All developed code belongs to client.

insights.message: IP ownership clause may limit future development flexibility.
Support period aligns with industry standards.

evidence.snippet: All intellectual property developed under this agreement shall belong to the Client.

clauses.title: Data Minimization
clauses.summary: Only collect data necessary for service provision.

clauses.title: Right to Erasure
clauses.summary: Complete data deletion within 30 days of request.

insights.message: Data breach notification timeline may be challenging to meet.
Data erasure process needs technical validation.
Data minimization requirements may impact analytics capabilities.

evidence.snippet: Data Controller must be notified of any breach within 72 hours of discovery.
Data deletion must be completed within 30 days of erasure request.
